name: Tales of Nooran
description:
Hello!

This is a no-tension, fantasy-style adventure game concept. This prototype explores my compositions in an overworld setting which highlights a world that is musically unique in a variety of locations. 

I created this project with a Wwise/Unity integration which was taught to me by Meghann O'Neill and Luke Bellamy. My world was made using Inkarnate. 

Credits: Composers
  • Mae Udarbe 
  • Alister Pirrie (Percussion for Valley of Spring)
World Building:
  • Mae Udarbe - with the help of Laura Mulcahy and Maxim Payne 
Visuals
  • Made with Inkarnate
Character Design
  • Ethan Mayer
Programming 
  • Mae Udarbe - with the help of Luke Bellamy 
  • Made with Wwise and Unity
